citations.narrative:
Storage. There is an open bag of guinea pig feed and an open bag of shavings/bedding on the floor in the animal room.
Food and bedding must be stored adequately to protect supplies from spoilage, contamination, and infestation. Open food
supplies must be stored in containers with lids or covers to adequately protect supplies from contamination, spoilage, or
deterioration. Correct by storing opened food and bedding in containers with lids or covers. Correct by February 17, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
3.25(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Storage. There is an open bag of guinea pig feed and an open bag of shavings/bedding on the floor in the animal room. 
Food and bedding must be stored adequately to protect supplies from spoilage, contamination, and infestation. Open food 
supplies must be stored in containers with lids or covers to adequately protect supplies from contamination, spoilage, or 
deterioration. Correct by storing opened food and bedding in containers with lids or covers. Correct by February 17, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member. 
 
 n
